pr_title: Yf fix il to bed sorting

timeline.message:
- IntervalListToBed was sorting the output lexicographically rather than looking at the sequence dictionary
- added proper testing. (with non-lexicographic order...)

- fixed imports
- add another unsorted output (bed)
- remove unused code
- fix whitespaces

timeline.bodyText: Any chance you can write 1-2 lines of comments about the properties of these BED files (ex chr5/chr4 are out of karyotype order)?  That way we don't have to look at the test files to know (but can look to verify).
timeline.author: nh13

timeline.bodyText: some comments on what's being tested would be nice.  Even "out-of-order gets put into karyotype order" or "seq dict is out of karyotype order, so sorted interval list will be too"
timeline.author: nh13
